channel.title: Deathlypvpzv3 - V4 Read
channel.description:
[b]Does deathlypvpzv4 have many bugs??????
is there a server like deathlypvpz thats stable and is around about the same
i see many players run deathlypvpzv3 why?? is that less buggy?[/b]

item.title: Deathlypvpzv3 - V4 Read
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

It is not meant to be ready to host perfect server.

You’re meant to make it look like yours and work with it.

I just recommend starting from beginning and adding your own stuff while doing it.

I know its not perfect because they dont want them hosted right away. Like most people do. Only the bugs are kinda stupid bugs that shouldnt be their. but i agree with you 100% your not going to find a perfect server that u can host. v4 isnt bad if u know how to fix the bugs in it. and its a decent server to learn how to fix problems and add stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Deathlypvpzv3 - V4 Read
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

[quote=“haviland4, post:1, topic:539737”][b]Does deathlypvpzv4 have many bugs???

is there a server like deathlypvpz thats stable and is around about the same

i see many players run deathlypvpzv3 why?? is that less buggy?[/b][/quote]
Well I’m not friend of leeching server.
You never know what kind of problems is there, if you wont do it yourself.

JCor9:

if your going to use i would use v2 if u can find it. v3 he updated to new maps and it was very laggy and such, v4 has alot of stuff wrong. i can think off the top of my head the rock crabs/yak tele didnt work and the skill cape shop would lower all your skills down to 98/99 so u could never buy a skillcape

It is not meant to be ready to host perfect server.

You’re meant to make it look like yours and work with it.

I just recommend starting from beginning and adding your own stuff while doing it.

Read full topic
